title: 42. Estheticians Are Already Influencers: How to Build a Community, Charge for Content + Brand Partnerships.
description:
Hi Roomies!! In this episode I'm spilling the tea on the newest area of our esthetics industry: influencing as an esthetician. 

This episode covers:

- how to get started

- my personal social media tactics

- what it takes to be a content creator

- strategies for growth and strategies I think need to die

- how to navigate paid brand deals, gifting, + affiliate programs

- how to know your worth and what to charge

Partnerships mentioned:

Carepod Humidifier

Use code Tessa15 for 15% off

Lashfood Lash Serum

Use code TESSA for 15% off 

You can shop my Glymed store here

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa
